subject: VAM Pro set linear motor questions
description_text:
Hello Simsonn-Team,

I have a quick question regarding the "Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor - the
Pedals Haptic Reactor for Vibration Feedback".
I was thinking of getting the 3 pack motor with the power supply. However,
I see in the picture that the power cable is made for USA outlets. Is there
a EU, or rather German cable version for this model??

Thank you in advance.

-- 

Mit freundlichen Grüßen,

Leon St.

conversations.body_text: Hi Leon Stöver,    We will provide the appropriate power adapter plug for the region corresponding to the shipping address.
